content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-11.5, 69.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 69.5)
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 71.5) with coal fuel
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, 75.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
The system is fully operational with the steam engine working and the boiler fueled with coal.

### Electricity Network
Consists of:
- Small electric poles connecting the steam engine to the mining drills and assembling machine
- Expanded power network with poles at positions (4.5, 77.5), (8.5, 77.5), (12.5, 77.5), (16.5, 77.5), (20.5, 77.5), (24.5, 77.5), (28.5, 77.5), (28.5, 81.5), and (33.5, 96.5)
- Electricity group with ID 4933 spanning from the steam engine to the production areas
The power network is operational with sufficient voltage (4196572) to power all connected electric entities.

### Iron Mining Operation at Position(27.5, 85.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 at position(27.5, 85.5)
- Electric mining drill 2 at position(30.5, 85.5)
- Small electric pole at position(29.5, 83.5)
- Both drills are operational and connected to power, mining iron ore at a rate of approximately 38 iron ore per minute.

### Iron Smelting Area at Position(28.0, 88.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace 1 at position(28.0, 88.0) with coal fuel
- Stone furnace 2 at position(31.0, 88.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter 1 at position(28.5, 89.5) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter 2 at position(31.5, 89.5) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest 1 at position(28.5, 90.5) storing iron plates (38 plates)
- Wooden chest 2 at position(31.5, 90.5) storing iron plates (empty)
- Burner inserter at position(27.5, 90.5) taking items from chest 1
- Burner inserter at position(29.5, 90.5) taking items from chest 1 to belt
- Burner inserter at position(31.5, 91.5) taking items from chest 2 to belt
The smelting area is operational, producing approximately 36-38 iron plates per minute, which are being stored in the wooden chests.

### Iron Gear Wheel Production Line at Position(33.5, 98.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 at position(33.5, 98.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Small electric pole at position(33.5, 96.5)
- Wooden chest at position(36.5, 98.5) storing iron gear wheels (41 wheels)
- Output burner inserter at position(35.5, 98.5) with coal fuel
- The assembly machine is now operational and connected to power, actively producing iron gear wheels.

### Transport Belt System
Consists of:
- Belt group from position(28.5, 91.5) to position(30.5, 96.5) with belts carrying iron plates
- Belt group from position(32.5, 90.5) to position(32.5, 96.5) with belts
- Belt group from position(35.5, 92.5) to position(33.5, 95.5) with belts
- Belt group from position(34.5, 95.5) to position(35.5, 94.5) with belts
- Individual belt at position(30.5, 90.5) with direction DOWN
The belt system has been reconfigured to improve flow, with several belts repositioned to create a more coherent transport network.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities where others already exist
- Check if an entity
